active.description: Sets the step as active. Is passed to child components.
active.description_zh: 将步骤设置为活动。传递给子组件。

children.description: Should be Step sub-components such as StepLabel, StepContent.
children.description_zh: 应该是 Step 子组件，例如 StepLabel、StepContent。

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

completed.description: Mark the step as completed. Is passed to child components.
completed.description_zh: 将步骤标记为已完成。传递给子组件。

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。

disabled.description: If true, the step is disabled, will also disable the button if StepButton is a child of Step. Is passed to child components.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用该步骤，如果 StepButton 是 Step 的子项，则该按钮也将禁用该按钮。传递给子组件。

index.description: The position of the step. The prop defaults to the value inherited from the parent Stepper component.
index.description_zh: 步骤的位置。该 prop 默认为从父 Stepper 组件继承的值。

last.description: If true, the Step is displayed as rendered last. The prop defaults to the value inherited from the parent Stepper component.
last.description_zh: 如果为 true，则步骤显示为最后呈现。该 prop 默认为从父 Stepper 组件继承的值。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。
